snippet: The Federal Communications Commission took an important step to end price-gouging but more needs to be done.
abstract: Editorial welcomes action by Federal Communications Commission that prohibits price-gouging by private companies that provide interstate telephone service for prison and jail inmates; holds agency must remain vigilant for similar abuses involving video chat, email and voice mail.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Communications Commission took an important step to end price-gouging but more needs to be done.
